subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Alfredo Di Stéfano, who died on Monday, represents a golden age of Argentine soccer that Lionel Messi and his teammates will attempt to live up to in the World Cup semifinal on Wednesday.
snippet: Alfredo Di Stéfano, who died on Monday, represents a golden age of Argentine soccer that Lionel Messi and his teammates will attempt to live up to in the World Cup semifinal on Wednesday.
